form.SN:
v ameriški angleščini pišemo
modeling, modeled
.

sense.def:
A model
je tridimenzionalna kopija predmeta, ponavadi manjša kot predmet sam.

seg.quote: ...scale models of well known Navy ships.
This system seemed a relevant model for the new Africa.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
a model of something
, na primer jasnosti ali pravičnosti, je izjemno jasno ali pravično.

Beseda
model
se uporablja v zvezah kot
a model wife
ali
a model teacher
v pomenu ‘izvrsten’.

Kadar človek
models oneself on someone
, posnema vedenje te osebe, ker jo občuduje.

seg.quote: The children have their parents on which to model themselves.

sense.def:
A particular model of a machine
je ena izmed različic stroja.

seg.quote: The Granada is the most popular model.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
models an object
, izdela neki predmet iz snovi, kot je na primer glina.

seg.quote: ...a statue of a boy that she had modelled in wax.

sense.def:
An artist's model
je oseba, ki pozira umetniku.

seg.quote: She was one of Rossetti's favourite models.

sense.def:
A fashion model
je nekdo, ki poklicno razkazuje oblačila, v katera je oblečen.

Kadar človek
models clothes
, se obleče v določena oblačila zato, da jih razkazuje v javnosti.

seg.quote: He models cardigans in knitting books.
She's not to do modelling while she's still at school.
